inclusion.criterion: Subject is 18 to 70 years of age, inclusive.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has cirrhosis due to chronic HCV infection as documented by:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has evidence of hepatic encephalopathy as evidenced by: Neuro-psychometric Testing (Number Connection Test, Trails Test, etc.).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is non-azotemic (creatinine <1.5mg/dL) and ambulatory at screening.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has cirrhosis due to chronic HCV as documented by: pathologic or clinical and radiographic evidence of cirrhosis with a positive HCV RNA PCR level.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject successfully participated in and continues to meet all eligibility criteria required in Phase A of the study based on completion of tests, Breath Tests, and Radiological Marker.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has a Number Connection Test score >50 sec at time of enrollment.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has received active interferon therapy within 2 weeks of enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a life expectancy of less than 100 days.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a history of alcohol abuse within 6 months of enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has active gastrointestinal bleeding at time of enrollment.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has used an agent that alters intestinal motility, eg, methadone, cholestyramine, tricyclic antidepressants.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is unable to take oral medication.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has used neomycin or other antibiotic within 2 weeks of enrollment or is actively using lactulose at time of enrollment.
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has cirrhosis due to chronic HCV infection, evidence of hepatic encephalopathy, and meets other inclusion criteria. However, patient has a history of NSAID gastritis and recent admission for UGIB, which may be exclusionary.
